title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message Delivery Feedback Details
description: Provide details for the delivery feedback for a single message in the Message Execution.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Feedback Status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Provide status of a delivery attempt.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: application id
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Unique identifier for the application that received this message request, if any.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: group id
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Group ID for the message request. Deduplication was done based on group ID + token. If no group ID is supplied then no deduplication would have been applied.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Push Token
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: push token the message request was sent to if this was a push notification message request.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Push Provider message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: message id that push provider assign to the message request, if the notification was successfully sent

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: request time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: time at which the message request first entered the system for processing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: received time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: time at which the system starts processing the message request

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: completed time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: time at which the system finished processing the message request

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Exclude Code
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Provide top level exclusion reason, like typology rule, mandatory parameter missing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Exclude Reason
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Provide exclusion subcode, like exact typology rule-id.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Reason

meta:enum.missingPushCredential: Can't find push credential for the notification's appID
meta:enum.unsupportedPlatform: notification's platform field is not recognized
meta:enum.expired: notification is already expired by the time we process it as indicated by the expiry field in it.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Failure reason for a failed delivery attempt.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Code
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Failure code for a failed delivery attempt.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Failure Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Classifies whether it is a soft bounce or hard bounce.

meta:enum.soft: The reason for failed delivery is temporary.
meta:enum.hard: The reason for failed delivery is permanent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Retry Count
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Number of failed attempts before the current event. The retryCount starts with '0', for message which is sent in first attempt will have 'retryCount' as 0.
